participant_1.background:
I watch football with my husband and discuss our fantasy team.
I'm 5'8", but my dog is only 20 inches tall.
I am feeling lost and confused about my future.
I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.
I'm the creative one in my family.

music has always been my number one passion.
I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates.
i live with my boyfriend of 5 years.
I am in good shape, and I am happy with my weight.

content.text: what's up? I'm going through a rough patch in my life and need someone to talk to.
hello, i'm sorry to hear that. what's going on?
I'm not sure what I want to do with my life. I'm feeling lost and confused.
I know how you feel, I've been there before. what are some things you're interested in?
I'm interested in music, art, and writing.
those are all great things to be interested in! do you have any hobbies?
I like to play guitar and sing. I also like to write short stories and poems.
that's awesome! I love to play guitar too. what kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a variety of genres, but I mostly play rock and blues.
that's cool, I like to play rock and blues too.
do you have any other hobbies?
yeah, I like to read and watch movies.
me too! I love to read and watch movies.
what are some of your favorite books and movies?
some of my favorite books are the hitchhiker's guide to the galaxy, the great gatsby, and the catcher in the rye.
those are all great books! I love the hitchhiker's guide to the galaxy and the great gatsby.
what are some of your favorite movies?
some of my favorite movies are the princess bride, the shining, and the godfather.
those are all great movies! I love the princess bride and the godfather.
we have a lot in common! I'm sure we can be good friends.
I think so too! I'm glad I met you.
me too! I'm glad I could help you
